deployment_relevant_files: README.md (contains AWS CodeDeploy create-deployment command / AppSpecContent example)
architectural_resources: Containerized web application (Axum HTTP server listening on 0.0.0.0:3000; src/main.rs)
Docker image build pipeline (multi-stage Dockerfile using rust:1.67 builder and debian:buster-slim runtime)
AWS CloudWatch Logs log group /ecs/axum-service (task-definitions/axum.json awslogs config)
AWS CodeDeploy deployment targeting ECS service (README.md command references CodeDeployDefault.ECSAllAtOnce and ECS TargetService)
Likely Application Load Balancer / listener rules (implied by repo name and CodeDeploy ECS + LoadBalancerInfo in README.md)
